title: FlexPay Invisible Recovery™
summary: FlexPay Invisible Recovery is an AI-powered solution designed to recover revenue and customers lost due to failed payments. It works directly within the payments system, optimizing retry strategies to minimize churn and maximize customer retention.
key_points: Recovers up to 70% of failed payments.
Faster recovery (2.6 days vs 30 days for other methods).
Reduces churn caused by failed payments.
AI-powered solution with optimized retry strategies.
